mapper.insert: insert into sys_logininfor (user_name, status, ipaddr, login_location, browser, os, msg, login_time) values (#{userName}, #{status}, #{ipaddr}, #{loginLocation}, #{browser}, #{os}, #{msg}, sysdate())
mapper.select:
select lf.info_id, lf.user_name, lf.ipaddr, lf.login_location, lf.browser, lf.os, lf.status, lf.msg, lf.login_time from sys_logininfor lf left join sys_user u on lf.user_name = u.user_name left join sys_tenant t on t.t_id = u.t_id
AND ipaddr like concat('%', #{ipaddr}, '%')
AND browser = #{browser}
AND lf.user_name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
and date_format(login_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i-%s') >= date_format(#{beginTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i-%s')
and date_format(login_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i-%s') <= date_format(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i-%s')
and t.t_id = #{tid}
order by info_id desc
